title: Galaxy S22 series doesn’t support eSIM on Google Fi, may be coming in a ‘future update’
content:
The Galaxy S22 ships with its eSIM feature enabled in the United States, and that’s good news for Google Fi, as a coming update will allow the carrier to work without a physical card on Samsung’s latest flagships.

more…

The post Galaxy S22 series doesn’t support eSIM on Google Fi, may be coming in a ‘future update’ appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a "Product Expert" on Reddit, Google Fi will be supported over eSIM on the Galaxy S22 series in a future update.
